shortdesc.ph: Sets the playback position of the specified audio effect file.
Sets the playback position of the specified audio effect file.
Sets the playback position of the specified audio effect file.
Sets the playback position of the specified audio effect file.

p.codeblock: abstract setEffectPosition(soundId: number, pos: number): number;
abstract setEffectPosition(soundId: number, pos: number): number;
Future<void> setEffectPosition({required int soundId, required int pos});
public abstract int SetEffectPosition(int soundId, int pos);

section.p: After successful setting, the local audio effect file plays from the specified position.
After the setting is successful, the local audio effect file starts playing from the specified position.
After successful setting, the local audio effect file will start playing from the specified position.
After successful setting, the local audio effect file will start playing from the specified position.
section.note: You need to call this method after .
This method must be called after .
This method must be called after playEffect.

plentry.pd: The ID of the audio effect. Each audio effect has a unique ID.
The playback position of the audio effect file, in milliseconds.
The ID of the audio effect. Each audio effect has a unique ID.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
